verses.verse: שְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> she-Ma' Hear יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, O Israel אַתָּ֨ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah You עֹבֵ֤ר <S%H5674><s%> 'o-Ver Thou [art] to pass over הַיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> hai-yOm this day אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den, Jordan לָבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> la-Vo to go in לָרֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H3423><s%> la-Re-shet to possess גּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim, nations גְּדֹלִ֥ים <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lim greater וַעֲצֻמִ֖ים <S%H6099><s%> va-'a-tzu-Mim and mightier מִמֶּ֑ךָּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Me-ka; than עָרִ֛ים <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rim than thyself cities גְּדֹלֹ֥ת <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lot great וּבְצֻרֹ֖ת <S%H1219><s%> u-ve-tzu-Rot and fenced up בַּשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> bash-sha-Ma-yim. to heaven

עַֽם־ <S%H5971><s%> 'am- A people גָּד֥וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol great וָרָ֖ם <S%H7311><s%> va-Ram and tall בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the children עֲנָקִ֑ים <S%H6062><s%> 'a-na-Kim; of the Anakims אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom אַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you יָדַ֙עְתָּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da'-ta whom thou knowest וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah you שָׁמַ֔עְתָּ <S%H8085><s%> sha-Ma'-ta, and [of whom] thou hast heard מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who יִתְיַצֵּ֔ב <S%H3320><s%> yit-yatz-Tzev, [say] Who can stand לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the children עֲנָֽק׃ <S%H6061><s%> 'a-Nak. of Anak

וְיָדַעְתָּ֣ <S%H3045><s%> ve-ya-da'-Ta Understand הַיּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom, therefore this day כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> ki that it יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh that the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> hu- who הָעֹבֵ֤ר <S%H5674><s%> ha-'o-Ver [is] he which goeth over לְפָנֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nei-cha before אֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> 'esh fire אֹֽכְלָ֔ה <S%H398><s%> 'o-che-Lah, thee [as] a consuming ה֧וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu He יַשְׁמִידֵ֛ם <S%H8045><s%> yash-mi-Dem he shall destroy וְה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu and He יַכְנִיעֵ֖ם <S%H3665><s%> yach-ni-'Em them and he shall bring them down לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nei-cha; before thy face וְהֽוֹרַשְׁתָּ֤ם <S%H3423><s%> ve-ho-rash-Tam so shalt thou drive them out וְהַֽאַבַדְתָּם֙ <S%H6><s%> ve-ha-'a-vad-Tam and destroy מַהֵ֔ר <S%H4118><s%> ma-Her, them quickly כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber hath said יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh as the LORD לָֽךְ׃ Lach.

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תֹּאמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> to-Mar Speak בִּלְבָבְךָ֗ <S%H3824><s%> bil-va-ve-Cha, not thou in thine heart בַּהֲדֹ֣ף <S%H1920><s%> ba-ha-Dof hath cast them out יְהוָה֩ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh after that the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֨יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God אֹתָ֥ם׀ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam מִלְּפָנֶיךָ֮ <S%H6440><s%> mil-le-fa-nei-Cha from before לֵאמֹר֒ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor thee saying בְּצִדְקָתִי֙ <S%H6666><s%> be-tzid-ka-Ti For my righteousness הֱבִיאַ֣נִי <S%H935><s%> he-vi-'A-ni hath brought me in יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD לָרֶ֖שֶׁת <S%H3423><s%> la-Re-shet to possess אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz this land הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot; likewise וּבְרִשְׁעַת֙ <S%H3423><s%> u-ve-rish-'At doth drive them out הַגּוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim of these nations הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh, of these יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD מוֹרִישָׁ֥ם <S%H7564><s%> mo-ri-Sham but for the wickedness מִפָּנֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6440><s%> mip-pa-Nei-cha. from before

לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo for בְצִדְקָתְךָ֗ <S%H6666><s%> ve-tzid-ka-te-Cha, Not for thy righteousness וּבְיֹ֙שֶׁר֙ <S%H3476><s%> u-ve-Yo-sher or for the uprightness לְבָ֣בְךָ֔ <S%H3824><s%> le-Va-ve-cha, of thine heart אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you בָ֖א <S%H935><s%> va dost thou go לָרֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H3423><s%> la-Re-shet to possess אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אַרְצָ֑ם <S%H776><s%> 'ar-Tzam; their land כִּ֞י <S%H3588><s%> ki because בְּרִשְׁעַ֣ת׀ <S%H3423><s%> be-rish-'At doth drive them out הַגּוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim of these nations הָאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh, of these יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God מוֹרִישָׁ֣ם <S%H7564><s%> mo-ri-Sham but for the wickedness מִפָּנֶ֔יךָ <S%H6440><s%> mip-pa-Nei-cha, from before וּלְמַ֜עַן <S%H4616><s%> u-le-Ma-'an order הָקִ֣ים <S%H6965><s%> ha-Kim thee and that he may perform אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַדָּבָ֗ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var, the word אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which נִשְׁבַּ֤ע <S%H7650><s%> nish-Ba' sware יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD לַאֲבֹתֶ֔יךָ <S%H1><s%> la-'a-vo-Tei-cha, unto thy fathers לְאַבְרָהָ֥ם <S%H85><s%> le-'av-ra-Ham] Abraham לְיִצְחָ֖ק <S%H3327><s%> le-yitz-Chak] Isaac וּֽלְיַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> u-le-ya-'a-ko.] and Jacob

וְיָדַעְתָּ֗ <S%H3045><s%> ve-ya-da'-Ta, Understand כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo because בְצִדְקָֽתְךָ֙ <S%H6666><s%> ve-tzid-ka-te-Cha it for thy righteousness יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh therefore that the LORD אֱ֠לֹהֶיךָ <S%H430><s%> 'E-lo-hei-cha thy God נֹתֵ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> no-Ten giveth לְךָ֜ le-Cha אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֧רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz land הַטּוֹבָ֛ה <S%H2896><s%> hat-to-Vah thee not this good הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot likewise לְרִשְׁתָּ֑הּ <S%H3423><s%> le-rish-Tah; to possess כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> 'am- people קְשֵׁה־ <S%H7186><s%> ke-sheh- churlish עֹ֖רֶף <S%H6203><s%> 'O-ref stiff-necked אָֽתָּה׃ <S%H859><s%> 'At-tah. you

זְכֹר֙ <S%H2142><s%> ze-Chor Remember אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּשְׁכַּ֔ח <S%H7911><s%> tish-Kach, [and] forget אֵ֧ת <S%H853><s%> 'et אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- you הִקְצַ֛פְתָּ <S%H7107><s%> hik-Tzaf-ta to wrath אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh not how thou provokedst the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> bam-mid-Bar; in the wilderness לְמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> le-min- from הַיּ֞וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom the day אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- you יָצָ֣אתָ׀ <S%H3318><s%> ya-Tza-ta that thou didst depart out מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz of the land מִצְרַ֗יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until בֹּֽאֲכֶם֙ <S%H935><s%> bo-'a-Chem until ye came עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until הַמָּק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> ham-ma-Kom unto this place הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh, this מַמְרִ֥ים <S%H4784><s%> mam-Rim ye have been rebellious הֱיִיתֶ֖ם <S%H1961><s%> he-yi-Tem have been עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- against יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD

וּבְחֹרֵ֥ב <S%H2722><s%> u-ve-cho-Rev Also in Horeb הִקְצַפְתֶּ֖ם <S%H7107><s%> hik-tzaf-Tem to wrath אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD וַיִּתְאַנַּ֧ף <S%H599><s%> vai-yit-'an-Naf was angry יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh so that the LORD בָּכֶ֖ם ba-Chem לְהַשְׁמִ֥יד <S%H8045><s%> le-hash-Mid with you to have destroyed אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem.

בַּעֲלֹתִ֣י <S%H5927><s%> ba-'a-lo-Ti When I was gone up הָהָ֗רָה <S%H2022><s%> ha-Ha-rah, into the mount לָקַ֜חַת <S%H3947><s%> la-Ka-chat to receive לוּחֹ֤ת <S%H3871><s%> lu-Chot the tables הָֽאֲבָנִים֙ <S%H68><s%> ha-'a-va-Nim of stone לוּחֹ֣ת <S%H3871><s%> lu-Chot [even] the tables הַבְּרִ֔ית <S%H1285><s%> hab-be-Rit, of the covenant אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which כָּרַ֥ת <S%H3772><s%> ka-Rat made יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD עִמָּכֶ֑ם <S%H5973><s%> 'im-ma-Chem; with וָאֵשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> va-'e-Shev with you then I abode בָּהָ֗ר <S%H2022><s%> ba-Har, in the mount אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> 'ar-ba-'Im forty יוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> yOm days וְאַרְבָּעִ֣ים <S%H705><s%> ve-'ar-ba-'Im and forty לַ֔יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> Lay-lah, nights לֶ֚חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Le-chem bread לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo neither אָכַ֔לְתִּי <S%H398><s%> 'a-Chal-ti, I neither did eat וּמַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> u-Ma-yim water לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor שָׁתִֽיתִי׃ <S%H8354><s%> sha-Ti-ti. nor drink

וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-Ten delivered יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁנֵי֙ <S%H8147><s%> she-Nei unto me two לוּחֹ֣ת <S%H3871><s%> lu-Chot tables הָֽאֲבָנִ֔ים <S%H68><s%> ha-'a-va-Nim, of stone כְּתֻבִ֖ים <S%H3789><s%> ke-tu-Vim written בְּאֶצְבַּ֣ע <S%H676><s%> be-'etz-Ba' with the finger אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him; of God וַעֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H5921><s%> va-'a-lei-Hem, and on כְּֽכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ke-chol- them all הַדְּבָרִ֡ים <S%H1697><s%> had-de-va-Rim and on them [was written] according to all the words אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which דִּבֶּר֩ <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber spake יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD עִמָּכֶ֥ם <S%H5973><s%> 'im-ma-Chem at בָּהָ֛ר <S%H2022><s%> ba-Har with you in the mount מִתּ֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> mit-Toch out of the midst הָאֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> ha-'Esh of the fire בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom in the day הַקָּהָֽל׃ <S%H6951><s%> hak-ka-Hal. of the assembly

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi, came מִקֵּץ֙ <S%H7093><s%> mik-Ketz And it came to pass at the end אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <S%H705><s%> 'ar-ba-'Im of forty י֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom, days וְאַרְבָּעִ֖ים <S%H705><s%> ve-'ar-ba-'Im and forty לָ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> La-ye-lah; nights נָתַ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan gave יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [that] the LORD אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁנֵ֛י <S%H8147><s%> she-Nei me the two לֻחֹ֥ת <S%H3871><s%> lu-Chot tables הָאֲבָנִ֖ים <S%H68><s%> ha-'a-va-Nim of stone לֻח֥וֹת <S%H3871><s%> lu-Chot [even] the tables הַבְּרִֽית׃ <S%H1285><s%> hab-be-Rit. of the covenant

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, to me ק֣וּם <S%H6965><s%> kum unto me Arise רֵ֤ד <S%H3381><s%> red get thee down מַהֵר֙ <S%H4118><s%> ma-Her quickly מִזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> miz-Zeh, here כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> ki for שִׁחֵ֣ת <S%H7843><s%> shi-Chet have corrupted עַמְּךָ֔ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-me-Cha, from hence for thy people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom הוֹצֵ֖אתָ <S%H3318><s%> ho-Tze-ta which thou hast brought forth מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> mi-mitz-Ra-yim; out of Egypt סָ֣רוּ <S%H5493><s%> Sa-ru turned aside מַהֵ֗ר <S%H4118><s%> ma-Her, [themselves] they are quickly מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <S%H1870><s%> had-De-rech out of the way אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which צִוִּיתִ֔ם <S%H6680><s%> tziv-vi-Tim, which I commanded עָשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Su them they have made לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem מַסֵּכָֽה׃ <S%H4541><s%> mas-se-Chah. them a molten image
